title: ITDex
author: ITDex
created_time: June 24, 2023, 04:17:31 PMLast edit: June 25, 2023, 09:38:15 AM by ITDex

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Don't you guys get tired? The umpteenth case of a newbie trying to get a loan in this section without offering collateral. To top it off you registered 3 years ago and haven't written a single post until this one. For this you have earned your first red tag. I think it's going to be easier for someone to show up and donate you the $100 than for someone to offer to lend it to you.

comments.author: ITDex
comments.body: You're right. I'll be closing this post

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: ITDex on June 25, 2023, 09:37:17 AMYou're right. I'll be closing this postThe previous poster was far too harsh giving you negative without first esblishing a few things such as whether or not you can offer collateral. Or, appealing in your local section for digital work such as translations you mentioned.You might be able to pick up some work locally.Good luck.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on June 25, 2023, 10:37:18 AMYou might be able to pick up some work locally.I think that his best chance for fast cash is a local pawn shop or asking from friends.But I also think that the first reply has a huge chance to be on spot and the newbies asking here for "loans" don't want to actually repay them.

comments.author: ITDex
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on June 25, 2023, 10:37:18 AMQuote from: ITDex on June 25, 2023, 09:37:17 AMYou're right. I'll be closing this postThe previous poster was far too harsh giving you negative without first esblishing a few things such as whether or not you can offer collateral. Or, appealing in your local section for digital work such as translations you mentioned.You might be able to pick up some work locally.Good luck.Thank you for your kind words But Poker Player isn't wrong. I "closed" my thread because I didn't have any collateral to put up. (BTW I still don't know how to use the site properly, so pardon me for that (:I don't wish to make myself look any worse than I already have so I'll leave it at that.I don't have friends that are willing to loan (It's considered taboo/selfish to ask someone for a loan, especially when it's only $100), and we don't have pawn shops where I live.Thank you for the suggestions though, appreciate it

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: If you want to close the thread, just click on "lock topic" at the bottom left. Here in my case I am going to respond because someone I have on ignore (2 in this thread) has said something about me that is false, and that I have read despite having him on ignore because you quote him.Quote from: Timelord2067 on June 25, 2023, 10:37:18 AMThe previous poster was far too harsh giving you negative without first esblishing a few things such as whether or not you can offer collateral. Or, appealing in your local section for digital work such as translations you mentioned.I haven't given him any red tag. Condoras did.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: This looks very negative to me.Quote from: Poker Player on June 25, 2023, 07:34:44 AMDon't you guys get tired? The umpteenth case of a newbie trying to get a loan in this section without offering collateral. To top it off you registered 3 years ago and haven't written a single post until this one. For this you have earned your first red tag. I think it's going to be easier for someone to show up and donate you the $100 than for someone to offer to lend it to you. Just to remind the OP to start an introductory thread in your local section (in your local language) and get a feel for the Forum.(And you might want to lock this thread as it's being hijacked)Regards,
